column4: anybody know any tricks on increasing the overall volume of the sound card?  i get *much* louder sound, with no distortion, when i boot this laptop into windows
it could also depend on your media player.. some have fairly advanced configuration options :)
it doesn't depend on anything. all applications that play sound in ubuntu are quieter than all applications that play sound in windows
no idea.. like if i'm having issues with quiet sound in audacious i can bump up the preamp.. i'd just be worried about my speakers :P
